title: Can Not Buy Kassidin Skin and Champion Even With Enough RP (Lunar Revel Shop)

replies.body:
This is the same problem people had with the Snowdown Shop. Basically, there are 2 reasons why you would be unable to buy a skin from the Lunar Revel shop:

1.) The skin you want to buy is currently on sale in the normal store,

or

2.) The champion of that skin is currently on sale in the normal store (this only applies if you don't own the champion).

For you, my guess is that you do not own Kassadin, and because Kassadin is currently 50% off in the normal store, you are unable to buy Kassadin and his Harbinger skin in your Lunar Revel shop. Now, you can do one of 2 things:

1.) Wait until Kassadin is no longer on sale, which will be by the end of today,

or

2.) Purchase Kassadin right now for 50% off (or with IP).

Either of these options should allow you to make the purchase. I recommend waiting until tomorrow if the discount you have is greater than 50% so that you don't spend as much RP.
